issue.title: [Python] flake8 fails on Crossbow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3606](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3606). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It starts failing with flake8 3.6.0 (3.5.0 is fine):
